mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_temp (temp_id, EMPLYR_ID, temp_title, temp_content, temp_dt) VALUES (approval_temp_seq.NEXTVAL, #{emplyrId}, #{tempTitle}, #{tempContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT d.doc_id AS docId, d.doc_title AS docTitle, d.doc_status AS docStatus, d.created_dt AS createdDt, drafter.user_nm AS drafterName, dept.orgnzt_nm AS deptName, LISTAGG(approver.user_nm, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY l.line_order) AS approverNames FROM approval_doc d JOIN comtnemplyrinfo drafter ON d.EMPLYR_ID = drafter.EMPLYR_ID LEFT JOIN comtnorgnztinfo dept ON drafter.ORGNZT_ID = dept.ORGNZT_ID JOIN approval_line l ON d.doc_id = l.doc_id LEFT JOIN comtnemplyrinfo approver ON l.approver_id = approver.EMPLYR_ID GROUP BY d.doc_id, d.doc_title, d.doc_status, d.created_dt, drafter.user_nm, dept.orgnzt_nm ORDER BY d.created_dt DESC;
SELECT ad.* FROM approval_doc ad JOIN emp e ON ad.EMPLYR_ID = e.EMPLYR_ID WHERE e.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND ad.doc_status = '진행중'

SELECT ac.cc_id, ac.EMPLYR_ID, ac.cc_status, ac.read_dt, ac.doc_id, ad.doc_title, ad.EMPLYR_ID AS drafter_name, ad.doc_status, ad.created_dt, ad.final_dt FROM approval_cc ac JOIN approval_doc ad ON ac.doc_id = ad.doc_id WHERE ac.EMPLYR_ID = #{empId} ORDER BY ad.created_dt DESC

SELECT d.doc_id AS docId, d.doc_title AS docTitle, d.doc_status AS docStatus, d.created_dt AS createdDt, d.doc_html AS docHtml, u.user_nm AS empName, o.orgnzt_nm AS deptName FROM approval_doc d JOIN approval_form f ON d.apprform_id = f.apprform_id JOIN comtnemplyrinfo u ON d.emplyr_id = u.emplyr_id LEFT JOIN comtnorgnztinfo o ON u.orgnzt_id = o.orgnzt_id WHERE d.doc_id = #{docId}
SELECT apprform_html FROM approval_form WHERE apprform_id = #{formId}
SELECT orgnzt_Id, orgnzt_Nm, orgnzt_Dc FROM COMTNORGNZTINFO
SELECT EMPLYR_ID, USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ORGNZT_ID = #{deptId}
SELECT EMPLYR_ID AS empId, USER_NM, ORGNZT_ID AS deptId FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO

SELECT d.doc_id AS docId, d.doc_title AS docTitle, d.EMPLYR_ID AS empId, d.doc_status AS docStatus, d.created_dt AS createdDt, d.apprform_id AS apprformId, f.apprform_name AS apprformName, d.doc_html AS docHtml, u.user_nm AS drafterName, o.orgnzt_nm AS deptName, ( SELECT LISTAGG(l.APPROVER_ID, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY l.line_order) FROM approval_line l WHERE l.doc_id = d.doc_id ) AS approverNames FROM approval_doc d JOIN approval_form f ON d.apprform_id = f.apprform_id JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO u ON d.EMPLYR_ID = u.EMPLYR_ID LEFT JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO o ON u.ORGNZT_ID = o.ORGNZT_ID WHERE d.EMPLYR_ID = #{loginId} AND d.doc_status = '진행중' ORDER BY d.created_dt DESC

SELECT d.doc_id AS docId, d.doc_title AS docTitle, d.EMPLYR_ID AS empId, d.doc_status AS docStatus, d.created_dt AS createdDt, d.apprform_id AS apprformId, f.apprform_name AS apprformName, d.doc_html AS docHtml, u.user_nm AS drafterName, o.orgnzt_nm AS deptName, ( SELECT LISTAGG(l.APPROVER_ID, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY l.line_order) FROM approval_line l WHERE l.doc_id = d.doc_id ) AS approverNames FROM approval_doc d JOIN approval_form f ON d.apprform_id = f.apprform_id JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO u ON d.EMPLYR_ID = u.EMPLYR_ID LEFT JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO o ON u.ORGNZT_ID = o.ORGNZT_ID WHERE d.doc_status = '반려' AND ( d.EMPLYR_ID = #{loginId} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM approval_line l WHERE l.doc_id = d.doc_id AND l.approver_id = #{loginId} ) ) ORDER BY d.created_dt DESC
